name: Call Of Blocks: Blocky Warfare!
description:
You like high quality games!? You like great writing and great stories!? You wanna be involved in a fantasy fictional world like no other!?.... 

Then find yourself something better. This is an absolute garbage game that was made by a single person over two sleepless days and many suicidal thoughts.

If you still "somehow" enjoy this game than I appreciate it.
